definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Six light-minded girls are losing their passports and money on their way to Ibiza.
sentences.chinese: 六個頭腦簡單的女孩在去伊比薩的路上丟了護照和錢。

sentences.english: For men, the most-ordered item is burgers, followed by french fries and pizza.
sentences.chinese: 男性點的最多的是漢堡，其次是薯條和比薩餅。

sentences.english: I like to eat a pizza with onions.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡喫有蔥頭的比薩。

sentences.english: Parkson Plaza in the eating "pizza", I asked my mother where to go.
sentences.chinese: 在百盛廣場喫完“比薩”，我問媽媽要去哪裏玩。

sentences.english: If you have good to go, I will teach you how to make it .
sentences.chinese: 如果你準備好了，我來教你怎麼做比薩。

sentences.english: The school canteen provides hamburgers, sandwiches, pizza and so on.
sentences.chinese: 學校食堂提供漢堡，三明治，比薩餅等等。

sentences.english: Thanks to Mr. Li Jing's donation, we will provide free pizza for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 多謝李競先生的捐款，中午將提供免費比薩。

sentences.english: The pizza was quartered into six pieces.
I love making pizza with my children.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡和我的孩子一起做比薩。

sentences.english: I'm wondering whether you could come over for a pizza sometime next week?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道你下週什麼時候是否能過來喫比薩餅？

sentences.english: A clever marketing promotion pulled from the pizza industry?
sentences.chinese: 還是從比薩產業學來的市場宣傳良方？

sentences.english: From in this example in Leaning Tower of Pisa , I learned a lot of.
sentences.chinese: 從比薩斜塔這個例子中，我學到了很多。

sentences.english: I live at Tommaso 65, Croce Sull'Arno Pizza…
sentences.chinese: 我住在比薩克羅茲，蘇娜諾，多瑪65號。

sentences.english: Thank you for calling Joe’s Pizza.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您打電話到喬氏比薩店。

sentences.english: Unlike the tower in Pisa, the Capital Gate building has been deliberately engineered to slant.
sentences.chinese: 和比薩斜塔不同，這座塔的傾斜是刻意建造而成。

sentences.english: The hot grease of the pizza is nicely washed down by the refreshing beer.
sentences.chinese: 比薩的溫熱的油脂伴隨着鮮釀的冰啤酒滾入腹中。

definition: rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
